aboutMe: Hello! I'm Chloe Smith, an enthusiastic aspiring web developer diving headfirst into the exciting realm of web development. Ever since I wrote my first line of code, I've been captivated by the endless possibilities the digital world offers. My journey began with a comprehensive course covering HTML and CSS, and I'm eagerly anticipating delving into JavaScript and MySQL in the near future.

My fascination with web development stems from its unique blend of creativity and problem-solving. Each project presents an opportunity to push boundaries, refine my skills, and turn ideas into immersive digital experiences. While I'm still early in my journey, I've already gained proficiency in HTML for content structuring and CSS for styling and layout. I'm excited about the prospect of diving into JavaScript and MySQL to further expand my skill set and understanding of web development.

Beyond coding, I'm constantly exploring new technologies, staying updated with industry trends, and drawing inspiration from design and art. I believe in the power of continuous learning to stay ahead in this dynamic field and to make a meaningful impact. My mission is to leverage my skills and passion for web development to contribute to innovative projects and create engaging digital solutions that leave a lasting impression.

Thank you for visiting my portfolio! I'm excited about the prospect of collaborating on exciting projects, sharing insights, and connecting with fellow enthusiasts. Let's work together to create something extraordinary and make a difference in the digital landscape.

education.description: At Life Choices, I'm gaining proficiency in full-stack web development alongside essential 21st-century skills. The hands-on work experience, whether in LC Studio or with external partners, provides real-world exposure to client projects. With guidance from Life Choices' placement team, I'm poised for a successful transition from internship to employment, equipped to excel in the ICT sector.

At The Events Place, I honed my skills as an event planner with a focus on alleviating the stress and frustrations often associated with planning significant occasions. Drawing from personal experiences, including my own wedding day, I understand the importance of having a supportive team and expert guidance throughout the planning process. My firsthand knowledge of the challenges faced by clients allows me to offer invaluable assistance in selecting service providers, managing family dynamics, and ensuring a seamless event experience. With years of experience in the events industry, I am dedicated to helping clients avoid common pitfalls and execute flawless weddings and corporate events.

As a representative of The Events Place in BNI, I experienced the power of building trusted relationships in business. BNI provided a platform for exchanging referrals and fostering connections with professionals from diverse industries. Through BNI, I gained colleagues, business partners, and friends who contributed to my professional growth and success.

contact.name: Björn Salsone
contact.position: Owner of cpt and jhb region

education.description: As an intern at ARCC, I gained valuable skills in quantity surveying and construction project management. Working alongside experienced professionals, I learned to accurately estimate project costs, manage budgets, and analyze construction plans. Additionally, I developed proficiency in using industry-standard software for quantity take-offs and cost estimations. My internship at ARCC provided hands-on experience and enhanced my ability to contribute effectively to construction projects.

At Wynberg Girls' High School, I received a comprehensive education in a supportive and empowering environment. Founded in 1886, Wynberg Girls' High School is one of the oldest all-girls schools in South Africa, situated in Wynberg, Cape Town. Throughout my time there, I benefited from a rich academic curriculum, dedicated teachers, and a vibrant school community. Wynberg Girls' High School provided me with a solid foundation for academic achievement and personal growth, preparing me for success in my future endeavors.

testimonials.name: Akhona Mjikelo
testimonials.message: I've worked closely with Chloe and can vouch for her exceptional work ethic and dedication. She's committed, enthusiastic, and approaches projects with creativity and innovation. Her eagerness to learn and expand her skill set is genuine. Chloe consistently exceeds expectations, adapting and learning quickly. Her positive and vibrant personality also uplifts any team environment.

testimonials.name: Elvin Harris
testimonials.message: Chloe is very smart, determined, and endlessly creative. She tackles life's puzzles with ease, fueled by her sharp mind. When faced with challenges, she doesn't back down but stands tall, a model of determination. And her creativity? It's like a superpower, adding color and flair to everything she does. To know Chloe is to be enriched by her intelligence, emboldened by her determination, and inspired by her creativity.

testimonials.name: Marcus Adonis
testimonials.message: Hard working and always has fresh and out of the box ideas. A friendly and funny person to be around. Works well with a team and aims to produce quality work.

testimonials.name: Matthew Brown
testimonials.message: Chloe is a dedicated and enthusiastic learner who consistently demonstrates strong work ethic and commitment to understanding concepts thoroughly. Her collaborative nature and willingness to assist peers make her a valuable asset in any academic setting.

testimonials.name: Mohammad Mohamed
testimonials.message: Chloe Smith is the epitome of an outstanding leader and web developer. Her exceptional skills in web development are complemented by her natural leadership abilities. Chloe's kindness fosters a supportive work environment, while her intelligence guides teams towards innovative solutions and success. With her talent, kindness, and intellect, Chloe is an invaluable asset to any team.

testimonials.name: Tyra Parring
testimonials.message: Since meeting Chloe, she has made a big impact on me as both a colleague and a friend. She is a vibrant and determined individual that puts her all into the work she does. I had the pleasure of working with Chloe and while collaborating with her I got to experience her great leadership and communicaton qualities. I know that any workplace would be lucky to have Chloe on their team.
